title: Latvian Prime Minister Evika Siliņa's Independence Day message
summary_full: Latvian Prime Minister Evika Siliņa has published her message to the nation on the occasion of Latvia's Independence Day, November 18th. The text is reproduced in full below and the video in Latvian can be watched above.
